00030 #ifndef CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_LESS_H
00031 #define CONSTRAINT_DYNAMIC_LESS_H
00032 
00033 // var1 < var2
00034 template<typename Var1, typename Var2, bool Negated=false>
00035 struct WatchLessConstraint : public AbstractConstraint
00036 {
00037   virtual string constraint_name()
00038   { return "WatchedLess"; }
00039   
00040   Var1 var1;
00041   Var2 var2;
00042 
00043   WatchLessConstraint(StateObj* _stateObj, const Var1& _var1, const Var2& _var2) :
00044     AbstractConstraint(_stateObj), var1(_var1), var2(_var2)
00045   { }
00046   
00047   int dynamic_trigger_count()
00048   { return 2; }
00049   
00050   virtual void full_propagate()
00051   {  
00052     DynamicTrigger* dt = dynamic_trigger_start();
00053         
00054     var1.addDynamicTrigger(dt    , LowerBound);
00055     var2.addDynamicTrigger(dt + 1, UpperBound);
00056     
00057     var2.setMin(var1.getMin() + 1);
00058     var1.setMax(var2.getMax() - 1);
00059   }
00060   
00061     
00062   virtual void propagate(DynamicTrigger* dt)
00063   {
00064       PROP_INFO_ADDONE(WatchNEQ);
00065       DynamicTrigger* dt_start = dynamic_trigger_start();
00066       
00067       D_ASSERT(dt == dt_start || dt == dt_start + 1);
00068     
00069       if(dt == dt_start)
00070       { var2.setMin(var1.getMin() + 1); }
00071       else
00072       { var1.setMax(var2.getMax() - 1); }
00073   }
00074   
00075   virtual BOOL check_assignment(DomainInt* v, int v_size)
00076   {
00077     D_ASSERT(v_size == 2);
00078     return v[0] < v[1];
00079   }
00080   
00081   virtual vector<AnyVarRef> get_vars()
00082   { 
00083     vector<AnyVarRef> vars;
00084       vars.reserve(2);
00085     vars.push_back(var1);
00086     vars.push_back(var2);
00087     return vars;
00088   }
00089   
00090   virtual bool get_satisfying_assignment(box<pair<int,DomainInt> >& assignment)
00091   {
00092     if(var1.getMin() < var2.getMax())
00093     {
00094       assignment.push_back(make_pair(0,var1.getMin()));
00095       assignment.push_back(make_pair(1,var2.getMax()));
00096       return true;
00097     }
00098     return false;
00099   }
00100 
00101   template<bool b>
00102   typename disable_if_c<b, AbstractConstraint*>::type rev_implement()
00103   { return new WatchLessConstraint<Var2,ShiftVar<Var1,DomainInt>,true>(stateObj, var2, ShiftVar<Var1,DomainInt>(var1, 1)); }
00104 
00105   template<bool b>
00106   typename enable_if_c<b, AbstractConstraint*>::type rev_implement()
00107   { FAIL_EXIT(); } //cannot reverse a reversed constraint
00108 
00109   virtual AbstractConstraint* reverse_constraint() { return rev_implement<Negated>(); }
00110 };
00111 
00112 template<typename VarArray1, typename VarArray2>
00113 AbstractConstraint*
00114 BuildCT_WATCHED_LESS(StateObj* stateObj, const VarArray1& _var_array_1, const VarArray2& _var_array_2, ConstraintBlob&)
00115 { 
00116   return new WatchLessConstraint<typename VarArray1::value_type, typename VarArray2::value_type>
00117     (stateObj, _var_array_1[0], _var_array_2[0]); 
00118 }
00119 
00120 #endif
